!Lady of the Lake: Don't you know who I am? My mother lost everything that she loved, and her grief over the betrayal was overpowering. I am the child who holds hope and faith in the future. Some call me the Goddess of Water, but that title really belongs to my sister. My name is Eva. I will give my trust to a mortal over my own siblings, if they recite with conviction, and believe in that new future. Can you do that?
